title: WTB T204 Ramly Chief Bender in lesser condition
author: T206Jim

posts.post_title: WTB T204 Ramly Chief Bender in lesser condition
posts.post_content:
I would like to purchase a relatively inexpensive T204 Ramly Chief Bender for display, willing to accept poor condition with back damage. Send me scans and your requested price.
Jim

I'm going to assume you saw this one. This seller's items are always overpriced but he is a reasonable negotiator.

[url]http://www.ebay.com/itm/1909-T204-Ramly-CHIEF-BENDER-Athletics-PSA-1-/121079872668?pt=US_Baseball&hash=item1c30ec3c9c[/url]
Thanks for the tip, I had noticed it, but it is out of my price range unless there was a substantial discount.
